QuestData.Title: Urgent Delivery!
QuestData.Description: Now that you've gathered all that we need to replenish our healing crystals, I need you to deliver the vials to Zalduun, our priest. You'll find him tending to our wounded inside the central chamber of the ship.
QuestData.LogDescription: Deliver the Bundle of Vials to Zalduun at the Crash Site in Ammen Vale.
QuestData.CompletionText: Hello, $c. What have you there? Is it for me?
QuestData.RewardText: Good work! This will do nicely to replenish our depleted healing crystals.$B$BBut now that you're here, I think I have another use for you, if you're willing?
